My Blepharitis has gotten worse, limiting activities so on advice of friend using Cannabis oil for her MS I’m trying it. Go online, click and postie comes with package two days later. Early days but so far there’s some relief.

Coax cable in old houses can have an electrical impedance that is incompatible with modern digital boxes. #Telus provides a wireless option that gets around old cable. #Shaw has no competing product, most won’t rip up walls to replace cable. @keithbaldrey
@keithbaldrey Don’t think BC1 can be seen by those of us on Telus Optik TV.

@keithbaldrey For decades #VoiceOfBC with @VaughnPalmer was don’t miss TV for any #bcpoli follower. I provided questions nearly to the end when my Blepharitis stopped me. Shaw made regional programming cuts in several markets. Not likely to come back.
